posts.postText:
You may have heard that our host, Brohoster is completely gone and everyone is fucked, but never fear.
I have just retrieved a to-the-second backup of THE WHOLE SERVER FILES. We will now move on to a new host,
not a second of work, items or anything will be lost, and we will resume as normal. Possibly better than before!

Proof:
 http://i.min.us/ijfVwq.png

But...

Brohoster  is back up.

So the server should be up at the moment, right?
Brohoster is only up for 72 hours for customers to grab their files and run. The company came to an agreement with their server box provider.
